attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current climate of house prices being beyond the reach of first time buyers on low incomes we the the undersigned urge the Government to build new social housing to allow those on low incomes to have their own home at an affordable rent.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MoreCouncilHomes/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
